title: BRIEF-Algoma Central Corp Announces Agreement To Acquire Croatian-Built Vessel
text:
BRIEF-Algoma Central Corp Announces Agreement To Acquire Croatian-Built Vessel

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 19, 2019 17:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Algoma Central Corp Announces Agreement To Acquire Croatian-Built Vessel Sept 19 (Reuters) - Algoma Central Corp : * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORPORATION ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CROATIAN-BUILT VESSEL * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORPORATION ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CROATIAN-BUILT VESSEL * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORP - 3MAJ WILL COMPLETE VESSEL WITH FINANCING PROVIDED BY CROATIAN BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORP - REACHED AN AGREEMENT WITH 3MAJ BRODOGRADILISTE D.D. OF CROATIA * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORP - ALGOMA WILL PAY AGREED PRICE OF VESSEL AT DELIVERY * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORP - ALGOMA WILL ACQUIRE A NEW EQUINOX CLASS 650' SELF-UNLOADING DRY-BULK CARRIER * ALGOMA CENTRAL CORP - 3MAJ HAS COMMITTED TO A DELIVERY DATE OF SEPTEMBER 15, 2020

BRIEF-Algoma Central Corp Announces Agreement To Acquire Croatian-Built Vessel
description: BRIEF-Algoma Central Corp Announces Agreement To Acquire Croatian-Built Vessel
